snippet.title: Fish'em all! - Launch trailer for America -  Abylight
snippet.description:
This is the launch trailer for America (June 8th 2009).

Download this video in HQ from http://abylight.fileburst.com/FishEmAll_LaunchTrailer_USA_EN.mov

Official game site: http://www.fishemall.com

Fish'em All!™, an arcade game with real "coin-op" flavor!

Hold on tight to your Wii Remote™ and fish 'em all!

Alone, or with your friends, you will have a great time catching these little fish... they're crazy!
Beat your own high scores, take on challenges and solve fun puzzles in a range of amazing stages full of color and fantasy.
Watch out for the dragon, the ninja rat and the sumo toad!

Do you think it looks easy?

This game will bring all the excitement of the great classics to your Wii console.
Available soon on WiiWare™!


Features:

- Nine colorful scenarios.
- Three game modes: Arcade, Challenge, Fishtris.
- One or two players.


Arcade

Can you beat the high score? Play a game in "Arcade" mode to see how long you can last. Catch as many fish as you can within the time limit.

Challenge

Complete the challenges to unlock stages. You can then select any unlocked stage to play in two player mode.
Each challenge sets you a little target. Note how many fish of each color you need to catch. Sometimes, it will tell you which items you need to avoid or set a time limit.

Fishtris

Even more difficult! Every time you catch a fish, it will fall into the tube. If the tube fills up, the game will end. To keep playing, match three or more fish of the same color to make them disappear.
